subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Talks to sell the Detroit Pistons have hit a major impasse as Karen Davidson, the team’s owner, and Mike Ilitch, the leading candidate to buy the club, are too far apart on price.
snippet: Talks to sell the Detroit Pistons have hit a major impasse as Karen Davidson, the team’s owner, and Mike Ilitch, the leading candidate to buy the club, are too far apart on price.
